channel.title: How to play with friends?
channel.description:
My server is based on this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,509845.0.html
can anyone tell me how to change your ip and make it online with no-ip?
[My first time doing this]
Thxx.

item.title: How to play with friends?
item.dc:creator: @nikkidespard nikkidespard
item.description:
@nikkidespard wrote:

First of all,

Make sure you have portforwarded you’re ports : 43594 on the router settings , You can learn how to do this on :Http://portforward.com ,

After that download .no-ip.

You will not have to edit the source’s Ip address but may have to edit the client’s ip address to you’re own.

after you have done this you’re server should be up and running and ready to put on the moparscape server page =]

Read full topic
